title: THE HINDU IN AN EDITORIAL PROTESTS EXTREMIST OUTFIT VIOLENCE AGAINST BUDDHIST MONKS IN TAMIL NADU
content: – By Walter Jayawardhana – The Hindu in an editorial protested extremist outfits without any popular base have started carrying out violent attacks on Sri Lankan students, offices and Buddhist monks.
